main.description: Search for records near a given latitude and longitude

collection.description: The collection to search in, e.g. 'org.overturemaps.places'

q.description: A text string to filter records by

latitude.description: The latitude of the search centroid

longitude.description: The longitude of the search centroid

cursor.description: A pagination cursor to continue a previous search

output.description: The nearest records to the given latitude and longitude, with distance in meters

records.description: A list of records matching the search criteria

cursor.description: A pagination cursor to continue the search

errors.name: InvalidQuery
errors.description: Either q or latitude/longitude must be provided

errors.name: InvalidCoordinates
errors.description: Latitude and/or longitude coordinates are invalid

errors.name: InvalidLimit
errors.description: The limit parameter must be a positive integer

errors.name: InvalidCursor
errors.description: The cursor parameter is invalid or expired

errors.name: CollectionNotFound
errors.description: The specified collection does not exist on the server

record.description: A record with its location and distance from the given coordinates
